snippet.title: Angel in Danger - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Download on the iOS App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/angel-in-danger-3d/id905477325?ls=1&mt=8

Download on Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sakis25games.angelindanger

Angel in Danger is a 3D platform game with colorful environments unique characters and lots of action. It simply brings back the classic platform formula that was missing from today's mobile games.
Run and jump through 4 Worlds all packed with different and carefully designed levels. Find awesome power-ups to help you fight all of the enemies and bosses and bring peace to the Bright Kingdom.

Learn more about the game on:
https://www.facebook.com/angelindangergame

Visit our official site: http://www.store-sakis25games.com
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Sakis25
